sentence.Network_en: My heart goes out to Mrs Adams and her fatherless children.
sentence.Network_cn: 我十分同情亚当斯太太和她那些失去了父亲的孩子们。
他们成了没有父亲的孩子。

sentence.Network_en: This endurance made old Earnshaw furious, when he discovered his son persecuting the poor, fatherless child, as he called him.
sentence.Network_cn: 当老恩萧发现他的儿子这样虐待他所谓的可怜的孤儿时, 这种逆来顺受使老恩萧冒火了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 有什么以less结尾的单词么..？_百度知道 ... fanciless 缺乏想象的 fatherless 无父的 fathomless 深不可测的.
19名女性接受了和杂志社的对话，声称她们的女儿都“没有父亲”（fatherless），这19人大部分都被剔除了，原因是她们口中的“单性繁 …

list.abs: May his children fatherless and his wife a widow ., 愿他的儿女为孤儿 , 他的妻子为寡妇!
Ye shall not afflict any widow , or fatherless child ., 不可苦待寡妇和孤儿.
Since then , I had grown from a fatherless child into a middle - aged man ., 我从无父的孩子已经长成一个中年人了.
i look at myself as a fatherless figure ., 我把自己看做是一个无父的雕像.

be joyful at your Feast-you , your sons and daughters , your men servants and maid servants , and the Levites , the aliens , the fatherless and the widows who live in your towns .守节的时候，你和你儿女，仆婢，并住在你城里的利未人，以及寄居的与孤儿寡妇，都要欢乐。

therefore the Lord will take no pleasure in the young men , nor will he pity the fatherless and widows , for everyone is ungodly and wicked , every mouth speaks vileness .所以主必不喜悦他们的少年人，也不怜恤他们的孤儿寡妇。因为各人是亵渎的，是行恶的，并且各人的口，都说愚妄的话。

entry.tran: 没有父亲的;父亲已不在世的;父亲不在身边的
entry.def: You describe children as fatherless when their father has died or does not live with them.

example.tran: 他们成了没有父亲的孩子。

means.word_mean: 2. not having a known or legally responsible father
